name._instruction: Enter a descriptive name for this stimulation.

internalIdentifier._instruction: Enter the label that was used to identify the stimulation within the data.

lookupLabel._instruction: Enter a lookup label for this stimulation that may help you to more easily find it again.

stimulationApproach._instruction: Add the stimulation approach which this stimulation has deployed.

stimulusType._instruction: Add the type of stimulus that has been used for this stimulation.

dataLocation._instruction: Add all data files containing the stimulus content (e.g. movies, audio files, injected current traces).

description._instruction: Enter a description for this stimulation
